author: huozhi
message: Upgrade loader-utils v2 to latest patch (#78707)

files.patch:
@@ -1343,8 +1343,8 @@ importers:
         specifier: 4.3.0
         version: 4.3.0
       loader-utils2:
-        specifier: npm:loader-utils@2.0.0
-        version: loader-utils@2.0.0
+        specifier: npm:loader-utils@2.0.4
+        version: loader-utils@2.0.4
       loader-utils3:
         specifier: npm:loader-utils@3.1.3
         version: loader-utils@3.1.3
@@ -11082,8 +11082,8 @@ packages:

     engines: {node: '>=4.0.0'}

     engines: {node: '>=8.9.0'}
 
   loader-utils@3.1.3:
